words.source: H2009 interj. hinneh 'behold, look'; KJV 'behold', ESV 'behold', NASB 'behold'
H3027 n.fs constr. yad 'hand'; KJV 'the hand of', ESV 'the hand of', NASB 'the hand of'
H3068 divine name, Tetragrammaton; KJV 'the LORD', ESV 'the LORD', NASB 'the LORD'
H1961 Qal ptc. fs of הָיָה 'to be, become'; KJV 'is', ESV 'will fall', NASB 'will come'
H4735 prep. b- + n.ms constr. miqneh 'livestock' + 2ms suff.; KJV 'upon thy cattle', ESV 'on your livestock', NASB 'on your livestock'
H834 rel. pron. ʾasher 'who, which, that'; KJV 'which is', ESV 'that are', NASB 'which are'
H7704 prep. b- + art. + n.ms sadeh 'field'; KJV 'in the field', ESV 'in the field', NASB 'in the field'
H5483 prep. b- + art. + n.mp sus 'horse'; KJV 'upon the horses', ESV 'the horses', NASB 'on the horses'
H2543 prep. b- + art. + n.mp chamor 'donkey'; KJV 'upon the asses', ESV 'the donkeys', NASB 'on the donkeys'
H1581 prep. b- + art. + n.mp gamal 'camel'; KJV 'upon the camels', ESV 'the camels', NASB 'on the camels'
H1241 prep. b- + art. + n.ms baqar 'cattle, herd'; KJV 'upon the oxen', ESV 'the herds', NASB 'on the cattle'
H6629 waw + prep. b- + art. + n.fs tsoʾn 'flock, sheep'; KJV 'and upon the sheep', ESV 'and the flocks', NASB 'and on the flocks'
H1698 n.ms dever 'pestilence, plague'; KJV 'a very grievous murrain', ESV 'a very severe plague', NASB 'a very severe pestilence'
H3515 adj.ms kaved 'heavy, severe'; KJV 'grievous', ESV 'severe', NASB 'severe'
H3966 adv. meʾod 'very, exceedingly'; KJV 'very', ESV 'very', NASB 'very'
